law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Mutual aid agreement" means an agreement to establish and carry out a plan to assist in extinguishing fires and preserving life and property by providing fire fighting, rescue, or emergency medical equipment, personnel, and services.
"Mutual aid agreement" includes a reciprocal agreement entered into in accordance with former Article 38A, § 37 of the Code before July 1, 1989.
